column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It's all about the ramen
column2: huh? Let's start there then: I got the spicy tonkotsu ramen
column3: and let's say I was not a major fan. My main issue with the dish was the broth
column4: as it was too thick and just not enough for the amount of food in the soup bowl. Even with a proper amount of broth
column5: I don't think this was a stellar ramen. The noodles were not al dente and soggy
column7: my pork meat was very tender.
